mapper.select: select e.big_category bigCategory, sum(e.score) sum, avg(e.score) avg,count(e.lec_id) count from evaluation e, lecture l where e.lec_id = l.lec_id and l.prof_name = #{pname} group by e.big_category

select avg(e.score) totalAvg, SUM(COUNT(DISTINCT e.mem_userid)) OVER() as evaCnt, SUM(COUNT(DISTINCT a.mem_userid)) OVER() as totalCnt from evaluation e, lecture l , application_lec a where e.lec_id = l.lec_id and e.lec_id = a.lec_id and l.prof_name = #{pname} group by e.lec_id
